titleInfo.title: It's what you ask and how you ask it: an itemmetric analysis of personality questionnaires

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Angleitner, A., John, O.P., Löhr, F.-J.: It's what you ask and how you ask it: an itemmetric analysis of personality questionnaires. In: Angleitner, A. (ed.) Personality assessment via questionnaires. p. 61-107. Springer, Berlin [u.a.] (1986).
